title: Email Marketing Specialist for Vacation Property Management Company
job_overview:
Vacation Key Property Management is looking for an experienced Email Marketing Specialist to plan, execute, and optimize email outreach campaigns targeting absentee vacation homeowners and realtors across Florida.

Your primary goal will be to help us generate qualified leads and build referral relationships by running personalized, high-deliverability email campaigns that highlight our white-glove property management services.

????? Key Responsibilities:
Develop and manage cold email outreach campaigns targeting homeowners and real estate agents.

Create compelling email copy tailored to each audience segment (homeowners vs. realtors).

Use email platforms (e.g., Mailmeteor, Brevo, Instantly, etc.) to manage sends and track performance.

Optimize email deliverability (SPF, DKIM, DMARC setup, inbox warm-up).

Monitor metrics like open rates, click-throughs, and replies — and iterate based on results.

Maintain and clean lead lists to maximize engagement and compliance.

Coordinate follow-up sequences and automations to nurture leads over time.

Recommend and test subject lines, sending schedules, and personalization strategies.

???? Qualifications:
Proven experience running cold email campaigns for service businesses or real estate.

Strong copywriting skills — clear, engaging, and action-driven.

Knowledge of email warm-up, inbox health, and domain reputation.

Experience with CRM or email automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Brevo, Instantly, Lemlist).

Ability to analyze campaign data and adjust strategies accordingly.

???? Bonus Points If You:
Have experience in real estate, vacation rentals, or property management

Know how to segment lists by location, owner type, or property value

Can suggest scalable systems to grow email outreach volume without spam risk
